content.title: Validator Between
content.content:
The `between` validator ensures that a field’s numeric value falls within a specified range.
It can be applied to any field whose value resolves to a number.

Here’s an example:

Here the example: 

```yaml
fields:
  - name: opening-hour
    type: number
    required: true
    validation:
      - integer
      
      - name: between
        params:
          min: 0
          max: 23
```

Validator `between` supports the following parameters:

| Parameter | Type   | Mandatory | Description                        |
|-----------|--------|-----------|------------------------------------|
| min       | number | yes       | Minimal allowed value (inclusive). |
| max       | number | yes       | Maximum allowed value (inclusive). |
